item.title: MIGHTREYA delayed to first half of 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC

No longer due out in 2025.

Publisher 505 Games and developer Wazen have delayed anime-style hero action adventure game MIGHTREYA from its previously planned 2025 release window to the first half of 2026. It will be available for PC via Steam.

Here is the full message from Wazen on the delay:

Thank you for your continued support of MIGHTREYA.

Originally scheduled for release in 2025, we have decided to shift the launch to 2026.

I’m not struggling with direction—the problem is that there’s just an overwhelming amount to build. We are making every effort to ensure a release in the first half of 2026.

Development will continue toward a full release, and we’ll be sharing updates and new information along the way.

We truly appreciate your patience and support, and we hope you’ll look forward to what’s coming next.
